SEARCH
Package Service.Fine

Class FineService

java.lang.Object
Service.Fine.FineService
@Service public class FineService extends Object
Handles fine calculation, application, and payment operations for users.

    • FineService

      public FineService(UserRepository userRepository, FineHistoryRepository fineHistoryRepository, AmountValidator amountValidator)
      Creates a new fine service instance.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - repository for users
      fineHistoryRepository - repository for fine history records
      amountValidator - validator for fine payment amounts

  • Method Details

    • calculateFine

      public BigDecimal calculateFine(MediaItem item, int overdueDays)
      Calculates the fine amount for an overdue media item.
      Parameters:
      item - the media item
      overdueDays - number of days overdue
      Returns:
      calculated fine amount

    • applyFine

      public void applyFine(User user, MediaItem item, int overdueDays)
      Applies a fine to the specified user based on the overdue item.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who borrowed the item
      item - the overdue item
      overdueDays - number of overdue days

    • payFine

      public void payFine(User user, String rawAmount)
      Allows the user to pay part or all of their fine balance.
      Parameters:
      user - the user paying the fine
      rawAmount - amount entered as string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if user has no fines

    • payFineInternal

      private void payFineInternal(User user, BigDecimal amount)
      Reduces user fine balance and records the payment in history.
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      amount - amount paid

    • strategyFor

      private FineStrategy strategyFor(MediaItemType type)
      Determines the correct fine strategy based on media type.
      Parameters:
      type - media item type
      Returns:
      fine calculation strategy
